thread.title: Pawan Singh ruling Bhojpuri cinema in Bihar
thread.title_full: Pawan Singh ruling Bhojpuri cinema in Bihar - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pawan Singh ruling Bhojpuri cinema in Bihar
text:
Bhojpuri superstar, Pawan Singh, also called Pawan Raj, is ruling the hearts of people across Bihar. Pawan's films are running in more than 200 theatres in the state. The actor is currently looking forward to the release of his next flick, Raja.
Pawan's recently released films - Suhag, Sangram and Nahle Pe Dahla are making a mark. The actor is being appreciated for his wonderful acting and action stunts in these films.
When asked for an opinion on it, the actor said, "I am overwhelmed with the love of the audience."
(Source: Bhojpurimedia.com)
